get.description: List the operations for the provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

items.title: REST API Operation
items.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

post.description: Checks that the trusted signing account name is valid and is not already in use.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The CheckAvailability request

schema.description: The parameters used to check the availability of the trusted signing account name.

nameAvailable.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or is invalid and cannot be used.

reason.description: The reason that a trusted signing account name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if nameAvailable is false.

message.description: An error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

get.description: Lists trusted signing accounts within a subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

schema.description: The response of a CodeSigningAccount list operation.

value.description: The CodeSigningAccount items on this page

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

accountUri.description: The URI of the trusted signing account which is used during signing files.

sku.description: SKU of the trusted signing account.

provisioningState.description: Status of the current operation on trusted signing account.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

get.description: List certificate profiles under a trusted signing account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Trusted Signing account name.

schema.description: The response of a CertificateProfile list operation.

value.description: The CertificateProfile items on this page

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

values.name: PublicTrust
values.description: Used for signing files which are distributed publicly.

values.name: PrivateTrust
values.description: Used for signing files which are distributed internally within organization or group boundary.

values.name: PrivateTrustCIPolicy
values.description: Used for signing CI policy files.

values.name: VBSEnclave
values.description: Used for signing files which are run in secure vbs enclave.

values.name: PublicTrustTest
values.description: Used for signing files for testing purpose.

includeStreetAddress.description: Whether to include STREET in the certificate subject name.

includeCity.description: Whether to include L in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includeState.description: Whether to include S in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includeCountry.description: Whether to include C in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includePostalCode.description: Whether to include PC in the certificate subject name.

identityValidationId.description: Identity validation id used for the certificate subject name.

provisioningState.description: Status of the current operation on certificate profile.

enhancedKeyUsage.description: Enhanced key usage of the certificate.

requestedAt.description: The timestamp when the revocation is requested.

effectiveAt.description: The timestamp when the revocation is effective.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

values.description: Used for signing CI policy files.

values.name: VBSEnclave

values.name: PublicTrustTest

includeStreetAddress.description: Whether to include STREET in the certificate subject name.

includeCity.description: Whether to include L in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includeState.description: Whether to include S in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includeCountry.description: Whether to include C in the certificate subject name. Applicable only for private trust, private trust ci profile types

includePostalCode.description: Whether to include PC in the certificate subject name.

identityValidationId.description: Identity validation id used for the certificate subject name.

provisioningState.description: Status of the current operation on certificate profile.

enhancedKeyUsage.description: Enhanced key usage of the certificate.

requestedAt.description: The timestamp when the revocation is requested.

effectiveAt.description: The timestamp when the revocation is effective.

CheckNameAvailability.description: The parameters used to check the availability of the trusted signing account name.

nameAvailable.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or is invalid and cannot be used.

reason.description: The reason that a trusted signing account name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if nameAvailable is false.

message.description: An error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

accountUri.description: The URI of the trusted signing account which is used during signing files.

sku.description: SKU of the trusted signing account.

provisioningState.description: Status of the current operation on trusted signing account.
